SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM ( SELECT f.factory_in_item_code, f.factory_order_detail_no, d.comp_no, c.comp_name, f.factory_in_item_qty, c.comp_price, d.supplier_no, s.supplier_name, f.factory_in_item_date, f.emp_code, e.branch_no FROM Factory_in_item f, Employee e, Branch b, Factory_order_detail d, Product_component c, Supplier s WHERE f.emp_code = e.emp_code AND b.branch_no = e.branch_no AND d.factory_order_detail_no = f.factory_order_detail_no AND c.comp_no = d.comp_no AND d.supplier_no = s.supplier_no AND b.branch_no = #{branch_no} AND d.check_approval = 'Y'
ORDER BY factory_in_item_code DESC
ORDER BY comp_name ASC
ORDER BY factory_in_item_qty DESC
ORDER BY comp_price ASC
ORDER BY comp_price DESC
ORDER BY factory_in_item_date DESC
) t1 ) t2
WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{currPage}-1)*5+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{currPage}*5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Factory_in_item VALUES( Factory_in_item_seq.nextval, #{factory_order_detail_no}, #{factory_in_item_qty}, #{emp_code}, SYSDATE )
